name: Monster and the Candy Factory
description:
Monster and the Candy Factory is a 2D platformer/stealth game, where you play as a  candy-craving-monster. The goal of the game is to scare and faint the minions of the candy factory and steal their candies. Avoid being spotted to earn higher rank.

This game is a submission for Game Dev Network's Festive Jam (theme: Surprise).

This game was made in a week by,

LaserFocus

Jfstudios

Akusan

and Cedricvdg

Controls:
- WASD or arrow keys to move.
- "Space" bar to scare minions.
